title: How was your NTSE 2020 results? - Quora

response.answer_text: To answer this I would walkthrough you to all of journey - I am a student of DPS korba Chhattisgarh . I first came to know about the exam in class 8 when my sister qualified that . So I determined to qualify that too so to prove my presence in family !! I started preparing for MAT in November 2018 in class 9 by solving RS Agrawal . Did 1–2 chapters in 2 months . So after my final exams I became serious and completed the whole book around 1000 pages!! Yea but left some of the chapters . Simultaneously I had been studing PCM as much as I can yeah not biology as I hated that .The all things went well . Then half yearly came And I had opened the bio book and then completed whole syllabus in a week . After half yearly I started seriously like very seriously. I started off with SST so tensed about that . Completed whole syllabus form scratch . Felt very confident that I would qualify for the exams and only rank was to be secured . Exams day - MAT- pretty easy . My strategy worked so well that i had left with 15–20 mins after attempting the whole paper . I used to bubble after every 20 questions . Exams got over felt that I would get around 90–94 . SAT - The deciding factor . Jumped to SST first question - Who painted Mona Lisa i was like hahaha Then a question of ancient history broke me apart I moved on and on completed the whole paper in 1 hr 50 mins . All went well was expecting around 90 Expectation -180 Allens Answer key - 174 Resonance answer key - 178 Official answer key - 170 Felt ok ok then merit list came on 12 Feb 2020 and I was shock to see thr cut off That was 160  No. 181 kinda good and hope to qualify Stage 2 soon . All the best for all the aspirants !
